body: Tengus are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. All tengus have the following racial traits.
name: Tengu

sections.body: Tengus are fast and observant, but relatively fragile and delicate.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, -2 Constitution, +2 Wisdom

sections.body: Tengus gain a +2 racial bonus on Perception and Stealth.
sections.name: Sneaky

sections.body: Tengus possess a bite natural attack that inflicts 1d3 points of damage on a hit. This is a primary attack, or a secondary attack if the tengu wields a manufactured weapon.
sections.name: Natural Weapon

sections.body: Tengus begin play speaking Common and their own dialect of Tengu. Tengus with high Intelligence scores can choose any language as a bonus language.
sections.name: Languages
